body.p: Born in Mississippi c1842, Robert Ellis was listed as a steward in the 1860 census. He also was imprisoned in the Jefferson county jail, for the charge of theft. In October 1860, he was released to Marshall Woodson. Ellis fled to New Orleans shortly thereafter.
